name: Dutch Golden Age Masters
description: Journey through the Dutch Golden Age with masterpieces by Rembrandt, Vermeer, and other legendary artists.

stops.title: The Night Watch
stops.narration: This remarkable artwork showcases the artist's masterful technique and unique vision, capturing both the spirit of its time and timeless artistic excellence. The composition, color palette, and brushwork combine to create a powerful visual narrative that continues to inspire viewers and artists alike.
